definition: bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
light bulb/see also 電燈泡|电灯泡[dian4 deng1 pao4]/third-wheel or unwanted third party spoiling a couple's date (slang)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to dawdle/to go slow deliberately/to fizzle out/to have all one's hopes dashed/(Tw) to have a soak in a hot spring
to add water (or other liquid) to (another ingredient such as powdered milk or tea leaves)/to infuse (tea)
to bubble/to foam/to blister/to sprout boils (on one's body)/sparkling (wine etc)

sentences.english: After making his tea, I asked if it would be all right if I visited him again .
sentences.chinese: 給他泡好茶之後，我問他以後是否可以再來拜訪。

sentences.english: A method for preparing chicken erythrocyte membranes in the form of small vesicles has been described.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了一種以囊泡形式製取雞紅細胞膜的方法。

sentences.english: It tastes like rancid fish steeped in gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 白酒的味道就像泡着腐魚的汽油。

sentences.english: My investments soured , though, and I lost the money.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我的投資泡了湯，錢血本無歸。

sentences.english: Hot massage for a while, and then use a spoon to stimulate it to soak in cold water.
sentences.chinese: 熱按摩片刻後，再用一把泡在冷水裏的匙子刺激該處。

sentences.english: Their hands blistered . but no one complained.
sentences.chinese: 他們手起了泡，可是沒有一個人有怨言。

sentences.english: And then we let the ball develop into a fully grown inner ear.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，我們讓泡囊發育成一個成熟的內耳。

sentences.english: The scene of this production Ouqi called cavitation bubble.
sentences.chinese: 把這種產慪氣泡的景象稱爲汽蝕。

sentences.english: Surface image was divided into two parts: foamed mask region and soleplate region.
sentences.chinese: 首先將表面圖像分成泡罩區和底板區兩部分。

sentences.english: See girl with respect to bubble, for day trade.
Efficient without a good soak decontamination vigorously scrub, do not hurt the clothing does not hurt the hand.
sentences.chinese: 高效好泡去污無需大力搓洗，不傷衣物不傷手。

sentences.english: Happiness would rise from the bottom of your heart when you're enjoying the hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 泡在阿爾山的溫泉裏，幸福則會從心底向外發散。

sentences.english: Compact florescent light bulbs, on the other hand, are a somewhat different story.
sentences.chinese: 相反，緊湊型熒光燈泡有些不同。

sentences.english: The apparatus and the bubble solution are made in the laboratory of BUIST.
sentences.chinese: 氦氣泡發生器，低速發生頭和發泡液由我們自制。

sentences.english: I simply spent those four hours marinating .
sentences.chinese: 這四個小時我就像泡在水裏度過的。

sentences.english: Thoracoscopy revealed multiple diffuse lung cysts.
sentences.chinese: 胸腔鏡下看見瀰漫性多發肺囊泡。
